name: Rem Iowa Community Services, INC
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Rem Iowa Community Services, INC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Davenport, IA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $87.1M in Medicaid payments across 276K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $87.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
